    • Constructor Detail

      • Evolver

        public Evolver(java.lang.Double[] y)
        Default constructor to create an Evolver.
        Parameters:
        y - the target/ideal/correct values that the Evolver should consider the fittest possible values.

      • Evolver

        public Evolver(java.lang.Double[] y,
       int popSize,
       int eliteRate,
       int numGen,
       double crossoverRate,
       double mutationRate)
        Constructor to create an Evolver with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        y - the target/ideal/correct values that the Evolver should consider the fittest possible values.
        popSize - the size of the initial population.
        eliteRate - the percentage of most fit individuals to survive into the next generation.
        numGen - the number of generations to run before the evolution is considered finished.
        crossoverRate - the probability of the CrossoverPolicy being applied to parent chromosomes.
        mutationRate - the probability of the MutationPolicy being applied to offspring chromosomes.

    • Method Detail

      • getRandomPopulation

        public org.apache.commons.math3.genetics.ElitisticListPopulation getRandomPopulation(int size,
                                                                            double eliteRate)
        Generate a random ElitisticListPopulation of NeuralNetworkChromosomes of the given size with the given elitism rate.
        Parameters:
        size - the size of the population.
        eliteRate - the percentage of most fit individuals to survive into the next generation.
        Returns:
        the random random ElitisticListPopulation of NeuralNetworkChromosomes.
